name.text: Calculate the Abbe Number of Glass

questiontext.text:
Given a glass material with the following refractive indices:

  • Refractive index at the D line (589 nm): nD = 1.523
  • Refractive index at the F line (486 nm): nf = 1.531
  • Refractive index at the C line (656 nm): nc = 1.517

Calculate the Abbe number VD for the given glass using the formula:

generalfeedback.text: The Abbe number quantifies the glass's dispersion and helps determine its optical characteristics. You can calculate it using the formula VD = (nD - 1) / (nf - nc).
